page.title: 15QUARRIES
page.content: There are five limestone quarries in our area,only one still in use- { {CLIFF QUARRY}- owned by Butterley Aggregrates.The disused quarries are - {HILTS QUARRY}_This is owned by Rolls Royce of Derby and was used for toxic waste.It operates every day but Sunday ,but is not open to the public.It is next to the Junior School and there are warning signs on the perimeter fence. {OLD QUARRY}_ This is due to be open any day as a public rubbish dump which is causing local residents some concern. {QUARRY NEAR THE CHURCH}_This is owned by Granwood and is not open to the public although people do tip rubbish over the fence illegally. In addition there is {DUKE'S QUARRY} which is now a pleasant area for walkers.
